name: The Village (itch) (MissingTheMoon)
description:
In the Village Snowman are attacking your village. Lead the villagers wisely to defeat the incoming armies which will attack for six nights.

You can assign jobs to each villager. They can chop wood, craft arrows, shoot enemies, upgrade the tower and deliver wood and arrows to where they are needed.

Archers can not see the enemies in the dark. You have a torch with which you can show where enemies are.

Controls:

- Walk with 'W, A, S, D'
- Pick up / deliver wood with 'J'
- Pick up / deliver arrows with 'K'
- Assign jobs to villagers with 'Space'
To assign a job you need to stand close to the building, you want the villager to work  at. The Campfire counts as a building
